name: smartrail
description: Sri Lanka Railway Management System - Real-time tracking and ML-based arrival predictions

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run ml:dev"
scripts.client:start: cd client && npm run build && serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../ml && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && cp env.example .env && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: SmartRail Team
